title: Emmerdale spoilers: Chas Dingle’s discovery about Faith changes everything
text:
(Picture: ITV) Emmerdale are lining up an emotional heart to heart for Chas and Faith Dingle – and, as the pair pull no punches in their highly charged discussion, Sally Dexter, who plays the troublesome mum, has suggested that a relevation could finally make Chas thaw towards Faith. 
With Debbie wanting to unite the pair, she engineers it so they are left together to talk and Chas doesn’t hold back when it comes to confronting her mother about how feelings towards her.
Lucy Pargeter, whose scenes in the coming week lead to her maternity leave , explained: ‘Things definitely aren’t good for them! They’re at loggerheads and Chas is determined that she isn’t going to make up with Faith because she is convinced that she doesn’t need her mother in her life. She would much rather Faith just went back to wherever she came from and isn’t keen on her being in the village, wheedling her way back into the family.
(Picture: ITV) ‘I definitely don’t think she’d be at all bothered if Faith got the next bus out of the village!’
However, the discussion might take an interesting turn as Sally added to Inside Soap : ‘Ah, but then Chas discovers something about Faith that alters the whole situation again and it’s all quite serious but we can’t tell you anything more than that for now…
(Picture: ITV) ‘I think all Faith wants it to be accepted; she just wants to belong to a family and have a place to call home – it’s a big thing for her!’
Can Chas and Faith restore their fractured relationship in the make or break chat? Or will Chas head out of the village with things more tense between them than ever?
